concept.title: AF PGI 5316.104 Factors In Selecting Contract Type

conbody.p: Refer to OUSD/DPAP Contract Pricing Reference Guides (CPRG) , Volume 3, Cost Analysis, Chapter 5.3, “Recognizing Cost Risk”, for assistance in assessing contract cost risk and determining the appropriate contract type for the acquisition. Risk assessment guidelines and contract type definitions are included. Click “Launch Tool” from the CPRG page.
